General.Name: Chengdu Huaqi Houpu Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Houpu Clean Energy Group Co., Ltd. provides clean energy equipment solutions. The company offers containerized refueling installation systems, L-CNG and LNG skid mounted refueling systems, LNG and CNG dispensers, CNG and LNG dispenser calibrators, priority panels, intelligent serial port converters, compressor on-site control cabinets, CNG and LNG station management systems, and intelligent nozzle removal detectors for vehicles; and marine double wall pipes, mobile LNG bunkering stations, shore-based and barges LNG bunkering stations, and fuel gas supply systems. It also provides LNG road tanker gas supply skids, LNG integrated regasification skids, LNG split gas supply skids, LNG cylinder regasification skids, LNG gasification station control systems, and LNG permanent regasification stations; and hydrogen unloading PSOT, sequence panels, hydrogen refueling stations and control systems, hydrogen dispensers, and hydrogen dispenser calibrators. In addition, the company offers marine ethylene glycol heating systems, liquid hydrogen vacuum insulated cryogenic pipes, hydrogen and cryogenic breakaway coupling systems, hydrogen refueling nozzles, mass flowmeters, cryogenic submerged centrifugal and reciprocating pumps, LNG refueling nozzles and vehicle receptacles, solenoid valves, vacuum detectors, vacuum insulated cryogenic pump sumps and valve boxes, liquid and gas separators, condensers, vaporizers, marine heat exchangers, and cryogenic storage tanks and equipment. Further, it provides platform for HopNet equipment supervision systems; IC card management systems; self service rechange devices; station control systems; RFID systems; wireless handheld data collectors; oil and gas recovery online monitoring systems; and wall tank leak detectors. The company was formerly known as Houpu Clean Energy Co., Ltd. Houpu Clean Energy Group Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

2.Name: Ms. Wanling  Hu
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
